story_arceus_02_04000/2401_1101_0100_20:
Leon earnestly began training in hopes of
gaining the power of an arc suit, but...
story_arceus_02_04000/2401_1001_0200_10:
(Our sync stone ultimate still won’t shine, no
matter how much we train.)
story_arceus_02_04000/2401_1001_0300_10:
(Does that mean my bond with Charizard still
hasn’t been recognized?)
story_arceus_02_04000/2401_1001_0500_10: There’s somewhere you want to take me?
